summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2087 for the improvement of the alley in Block Thirty-nine (39), Capitol Hill Addition, Division No. 6, of the City of Seattle, being the alley from East Aloha Street to East Prospect Street and between Nineteen Avenue North and Twentieth Avenue North, all in the City of Seattle, by grading the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage; under Ordinance No. 21181, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
